item.title: Proj 2048
item.description: A few years ago Gabriele Cirulli developed a sliding puzzle where the goal is to grow tiles and get up to 2048. My â€œProj 2048â€ is about implementing several agents to play. Which should get tiles up to 4096 or maybe even 64536 (if itâ€™s possible of course) ðŸ˜‰.
